dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 5973 RH: Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Reauthorization Act of 2021
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself, Mr. LaHood, Mr. Tonko, and Mr. Joyce of Ohio) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on November 15, 2021

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Reauthorization Act of 2021.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990

subsection.text: Section 1008 of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941f) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), in the matter preceding paragraph (1)—

subparagraph.text: by inserting and not later than December 31, 2027, after 2021,;
by striking Committee on Resources and inserting Committee on Natural Resources; and
by inserting , with respect to the period covered by the report after describes; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2016 through 2020 and inserting 2022 through 2027.

subsection.text: Section 1009(a) of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941g(a)) is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2016 through 2021 and inserting 2022 through 2027.
Section 1009(a)(1)(B) of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941g(a)(1)(B)) is amended by striking 5 and inserting 3.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
